heading: HB05821
0: AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLES 171 AND 172 OF REPUBLIC ACT 3815 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE REVISED PENAL CODE, IMPOSING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR FALSIFICATION OF CERTIFICATES OF LAND TITLE OR ANY APPLICATION, DEED, INSTRUMENT OR SUPPORTING DOCUMENT, REASONABLY CONNECTED WITH THE TITLE, CLASSIFYING THE SAME AS A HEINOUS OFFENSE INVOLVING ECONOMIC SABOTAGE IF THE VALUE OR AGGREGATE VALUE OF THE LAND IS AT LEAST TEN MILLION PESOS (P 10,000,000.00)
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2019-12-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05821
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLES 171 AND 172 OF REPUBLIC ACT 3815 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE REVISED PENAL CODE, IMPOSING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR FALSIFICATION OF CERTIFICATES OF LAND TITLE OR ANY APPLICATION, DEED, INSTRUMENT OR SUPPORTING DOCUMENT, REASONABLY CONNECTED WITH THE TITLE, CLASSIFYING THE SAME AS A HEINOUS OFFENSE INVOLVING ECONOMIC SABOTAGE IF THE VALUE OR AGGREGATE VALUE OF THE LAND IS AT LEAST TEN MILLION PESOS (P 10,000,000.00)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED
DATE FILED : 2019-12-16
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2019-12-18
